metadata.title: CVE-2023-6351 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in libavif in Google Chrome prior to 119.0.6045.199 alloweda remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted aviffile. (Chromium security severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
